# Government Tender Announcement

## Reference Information

*   Tender Reference Number: cb-54-99585428
*   Solicitation Number: 23-232670
*   Publication Date: December 14, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: January 25, 2024, 02:00 PM (EST)
*   Amendment Number: 5

## Tender Information

*   Notice Title: English and/or French Second Language Training
*   Tender Type: Request for Standing Offer (RSO)
*   Tender Category: Service (SRV)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   Trade Agreements: Eligible under Canada’s trade agreements
*   Regions of Opportunity: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Tender Description

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking to engage a Standing Offer (SO) for English and/or French Second Language Training services. The objective is to provide full-time or part-time training services to post-secondary recruitment process candidates to help them achieve the CCC language profile as mandated by the Public Service Commission of Canada. The deliverables include training candidates to Level CCC in English and/or French using Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) programs. The Standing Offer will provide training services using either in-class or virtual formats, depending on the training needs of the candidates.

## Key Requirements

*   The offeror must provide six (6) French second language trainers and one (1) English second language trainer.
*   The training will be conducted in either English or French depending on the candidate’s first official language.
*   The offeror must provide a pedagogical advisor to the department.
*   The offeror must provide training services to groups ranging from one to six students.

## Evaluation Criteria

The Standing Offer will be evaluated based on a combined rating of Technical Merit and Price. The combined rating will determine the price of the offer and technical merits. The contract award will be based on the best value for the tender.
